search_results.inci_name: CHAMOMILLA RECUTITA FLOWER/JASMINUM OFFICINALE FLOWER EXTRACT

detailed_info.name: Chamomile flower extract
detailed_info.description:
Chamomile, also called German or wild chamomile, is a medicinal plant from the Asteraceae family. The flowers resemble daisies, with a yellow center and white petals. It has anti-inflammatory and healing properties. In cosmetics, it is used for its soothing effect on the skin and its antiseptic properties. It especially contains bisabolol which helps to soften the skin.
It is authorized in organic.

functions.name: Masking
functions.description: Reduces or inhibits the odor or basic taste of the product

detailed_info.name: Chamomile extract (flower / Leaf)
detailed_info.description: Matricaria chamomilla (synonym: Matricaria recutita), commonly known as chamomile (also spelled camomile),  Italian camomilla, German chamomile, Hungarian chamomile (kamilla), wild chamomile or scented mayweed, is an annual plant of the composite family Asteraceae. M. chamomilla is the most popular source of the herbal product chamomile, although other species are also used as chamomile.

functions.name: Antimicrobial
functions.description: Helps slowing the growth of micro-organisms on the skin and counteracts the development of microbes
